hero.subtitle: Recruiting professionals who push your business forward. Organizing everything to minimize your time and effort in the hiring process. Helping companies attract invaluable employees and talented professionals find top employers.

whom.title: Who do we recruit?
whom.subtitle: We find people who can develop, drive and grow your business.

how.title: How do we work?
how.subtitle: Impeccable service. Minimum effort and time on your part—maximum result

companies.label: Companies
companies.description:
We will find the right candidates ready for you within 1 to 2 weeks. Along with their CVs, we will send you a 15-minute video from the first interview and the results of 4 psychological tests. This way, you can get to know the candidates and pick the best ones even before meeting them in person.
All that'd be left for you to do is conduct the final interviews and pick the candidate who best meets your requirements and vision.

specialists.label: Specialists
specialists.description:
We will help you find top employers and exciting job opportunities, even if you’re not job-hunting right now.
Don’t have a CV? No problem! Our smart bot will help you create one in just 5 minutes. We will also guide you through a series of psychological tests, prepare you for interviews, and record a video self-presentation. All of these materials are yours to keep and use however you like.

partners.label: Partners
partners.description: Earn 7% of all payments from customers who come to us through your recommendation.

flexibly.title: If you don’t need a full end-to-end solution,
flexibly.subtitle: we can adapt to your specific needs:

recruiter.title: Recruiter Support
recruiter.text: Bring in an expert recruiter to your team. Our experienced specialist will take care of all hiring processes and help you find the right talents or build your startup, department, or team.

hr.title: HR Support
hr.text: Get an HR specialist to set up and improve your HR processes. They will handle everything from setting up a CRM system and digitizing your company culture to managing hiring, onboarding, corporate events, ordering company merch, and more.

sourcing.title: Sourcing
sourcing.text: We will provide XX CVs tailored to your request, so you can choose the right candidates yourself. Before reaching you, each candidate gets verified, completes 4 psychological tests, and several stages of preliminary interviews.

inTouch.title: Submit a request
inTouch.subtitle: We will contact you within 24 hours and start our search for the perfect employees for your business.

option1.title: Option 1
option1.payment: 100% payment on the first day of the candidate's work
option1.commission: Commission of 9-14% of annual income

option2.title: Option 2
option2.payment: 50% on the first day of work, remaining balance after the first month
option2.commission: Commission of 9-14% of annual income
